game_description: Play mini-games together with others or alone!
review_1: Several smaller games packed into a multiplayer party game. Its not the prettiest game to look at but it is fun to play. Big thanks to the developer for releasing this for free. Review and 4K Gameplay : https://youtu.be/Saem8pgWKBE
review_2: The game opens, but when I hit start nothing happens, I'm just standing in a field or something.
review_3: I love the game, im hoping to see future game updates. I love the idea and the whole game in a whole, this game is something i'd play with my friends and family every saturday!
review_4: Very fun and a lot of different games, was super fun to play with up to 6 people! I wish you could add the others you play with
